entry.title: Waring Commercial WICSP180 - Gelato Panini Press
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Panini Grill
Price: 851.00

The Waring Commercial WICSP180 is a gelato panini press. This ice cream panini maker allows you to add a new and exciting dimension to your dessert menu. Add some ice cream to the middle of a brioche bun, toast it, and serve this delicious treat. It's perfect for ice cream shops and treateries looking for the new hot thing in the frozen dessert business. Or you can use this bun panini press for savory dishes.

It's a lightweight, easy-to-use panini maker, which turns gelato, soft-serve ice cream, hard ice cream, or frozen yogurt into a creamy delight sealed in a golden-toasted bun. You can mix the ice cream with savory or sweet toppings, and can be served sliced on a plate, or as a full sandwich in an on-the-go wrapper. These delicious treats are warm on the outside, cold on the inside, and sure to heat up your business. Check out Waring's brochure on this item.

      • Bake golden-toasted, gelato-filled 4" diameter buns
      • Bake times from 5–15 seconds for the perfect gelato panini
      • Triple-coated, nonstick plates allow for easy panini removal and quick cleanup
      • Embedded heating element to perfectly seal your gelato panini
      • Heavy-duty die-cast housing
      • Electronic control panel for easy cleanup

VIDEO

SPECS

Model WICSP180
Dimensions (WDH) 11" x 17" x 10"
Weight 13 lb
Plug Type NEMA 5-15P
Cord Length 3 feet
Voltage 120
Approval cETLus, NSF
Amperage 10 amps
Wattage 1200 watts

WARRANTY

Limited one year warranty.

entry.title: Waring Commercial WBW300X - Bubble Waffle Maker - 120v
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Commercial Waffle Maker
Price: 694.00

The Waring Commercial WBW300X is a bubble waffle maker that can bake up to 25 bubble waffles per hour, with a rotary function that ensures even baking and browning. Bubble waffles are a popular Hong Kong-style street treat, which can make an exciting new addition to your menu.

The WBW300X has triple-coated nonstick plates which easily release the bubble waffles so they are perfectly formed and ready to be filled with ice cream, or you can serve the bubble waffles flat with sweet or savory toppings. An audible beat alerts users when to cook and when to serve, and cleanup are quick and easy with the removable dishwasher-safe drip tray.

      • Produces up to 25 bubble waffles per hour
      • Bake bubble waffles to top with ice cream and/or fillings
      • Heavy-duty die-cast housing
      • Rotary feature for even baking and browning
      • Triple-coated nonstick plates allow easy removal of waffles and quick cleanup
      • Plates are user-serviceable for easy, on-site replacement if scratched
      • Power ON and Ready-to-Bake LED indicators, plus audio chime signals when the unit is ready to cook and when the waffle is ready to serve
      • Removable, dishwasher-safe drip tray makes clean up quick and easy

    VIDEO

entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Commercial Waffle Maker
Price: 694.00

The Waring Commercial WMB400X makes deep-pocketed mini Belgian waffles, which you can top with berries, syrup, ice cream, or even chicken. This commercial waffle maker is designed to produce up to one hundred 1"-thick mini Belgian waffles per hour.

Each mini Belgian waffle is baked to perfection with precision temperature control and a rotary feature that ensures even baking and browning. Easy-to-clean, triple-coated nonstick plates release the waffles fully intact and flawlessly formed. An audible beep alerts users when to cook and when to serve.

      • Heavy-duty centrifugal juice extractor with continuous pulp ejection
      • Built for use in smoothie shops, bars, cafés, restaurants, hotels and healthcare establishments
      • Stainless steel filter basket and shredder disc expertly designed for a fantastic yield to save operators money and produce less waste

entry.title: Waring Commercial WWB5G - Medium Volume Hot Water Dispenser - 5 Gallon Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Hot Water Dispenser
Price: 1241.00

The Waring Commercial WWB5G is a professional hot water dispenser with a 3 gallon capacity (11.3 litres). It has a small countertop footprint: it's only 7.6 inches wide, 23.5 inches from front to back, and 26.5 inches high. It's simple to operate and can be used for coffee, tea, soups, grits, oatmeal, and more. It's perfect for corporate kitchens, places of worship, convenience stores, catered events, or any commercial kitchen that needs some instant hot water but doesn't want to take up too much countertop space.

It has digital controls and an adjustable temperature range from 150° – 205° Fahrenheit (65° - 96° Celsius). It has the patented "Tomlinson No-Drip" faucet and handle with a removable drip tray underneath — so dripping will be minimal and cleaning will be easy. It has a night mode feature which ensures hot water is ready to pour from the tap whenever needed.

      • Digital Controls and LCD Display for easy use
      • Precise Temperature Control and Accuracy
      • Temperature Control Range From 150° – 205° Fahrenheit (65° - 96° Celsius)
      • Stainless Steel Construction
      • Tomlinson No-Drip Tap Operation
      • Night Mode – Hot Water When You Need It
      • Guard Rails for Warming Surface
      • Removable Drip Tray for Easy and Convenient Cleaning
      • Small Footprint Saves on Counter Space
      • Perfect for tea, coffee, soups, grits, oatmeal, etc. 

VIDEO

entry.title: Waring Commercial WDH10 - Food Dehydrator with 10 Racks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Commercial Food Dehydrator
Price: 956.00

The Waring Commercial WDH10 is a professional food dehydrator designed for commercial kitchens. It has 10 stainless steel mesh trays, which are 15" by 13.5" (for a total of 14 square feet). It has simple touch controls with 5 memory stations to set and store programs, with a temperature range between 90 - 180 degrees Fahrenheit, and with a timer between 1 to 40 hours, and a rear-mounted fan for even heat distribution.

This dehydrator can be used for a wide variety of foods. If you're a pastry chef, you can use the Waring WDH10 to make various meringues, dehydrated mousses, dried herbs, or dessert decorations. Or you could use it for manipulating the texture of fruits like strawberries and grapes. If you're a mixologists at a bar, you can use it to make candied dehydrated fruits or herbs and infused powders to garnish drinks. Other popular favorites include pepperoni, beef jerky, and kale chips. You can also order an optional fruit leather sheet (contact us) to create fruit leather.

      • Built for chefs and mixologists looking to add unique flavor and texture to food and beverages
      • Digital LED display with capacitive touch controls
      • 5 memory stations for setting and storing unique programs
      • Adjustable temperature range: 90˚ - 180˚ Fahrenheit (32˚ - 82˚ Celsius)
      • View temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius
      • Set timer up to 40 hours, automatic shutoff when times ends
      • 10 trays of dehydrating space
      • 15-inch by 13.5-inch stainless steel mesh racks
      • Total dehydrating surface area of 14 square feet
      • Clear-view glass door for monitoring dehydrating process
      • Rear-mounted airflow system

VIDEO

entry.title: Waring Commercial WSM20L - 20 Qt. Planetary Mixer - 1 HP
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Planetary Mixer
Price: 3231.00

The Waring Commercial WSM20L is a professional countertop mixer (sometimes called a stand mixer). It is part of their heavy-duty "Luna Series" of planetary mixers. It is a 20 quart mixer designed for use in high-traffic cafes and restaurant kitchens, equipped with a powerful 1 horsepower motor and 3 speeds.

The Waring WSM20L can handle a wide variety of foods: you can power through mashed potatoes, meats, doughs, or batters. You can prep for baked goods, deserts, or main courses — bread, bagels or pasta. This mixer comes with all the necessary attachments: chef's whisk, mixing paddle, and a dough hook. It has a gear-driven transmission and thermal overload protection to keep this thing running in your kitchen for years to come.

      • Large, 20-quart stainless steel bowl with stainless steel handle
      • Heavy duty, 1 HP induction motor
      • Side-mounted controls
      • 3 mixing speeds
      • Heavy-duty bowl-lift lever
      • Gear driven, permanent lube transmission
      • Thermal overload protection
      • Includes stainless steel bowl, chef‘s whisk, dough hook and aluminum mixing paddle
      • Specifically designed for countertop use
      • Non-slip rubber feet

VIDEO

entry.title: Waring Commercial WDM360TX - Triple Spindle Drink Mixer with Three Speeds & Timer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Milkshake Machine
Price: 1798.00

The Waring Commercial WDM360TX is a heavy-duty, triple-spindle drink mixer with a high-performance 1-horsepower motor for durability. It will allow you to quickly mix the coldest, hardest ice creams. It has a three speed motor with a pulse switch and includes three stainless steel malt beverage cups.

This model has a fully automatic START/STOP operation, which means after you slide the cup into the mixer, it will operate without you needing to stand there. But with the programmable timer, you're really going to be able to ensure precise mixing results. The timer will help you improve your time management, and it comes with a large, easy to read LCD display and gives you the ability to program the timer either while it's in use, or before it's in use. 

This milkshake mixer has a rocker switch, for 15,000, 18,000, or 21,000 RPM speed capabilities. One other great feature is that there is an increased cup clearance, which means you're not going to have to tilt your cup into the mixer and risk spilling your product. Instead, you'll be able to easily slide your cup right into the mixer.

      • Pulse switch will run motor at selected speed to fine-tune your mix
      • Increased cup clearance: slide cups into position without tilt – don’t lose any ingredients before or after mixing
      • Heavy-duty die-cast housing – easy to clean and impressive footprint
      • Brand new ultra-aggressive agitator powers through the hardest ice creams
      • Also includes butterfly agitator for softer ice creams and use with many types of cups
      • Stainless steel malt beverage cup included
      • Motors incorporate thermal protection and are easily user-replaceable

VIDEO

SPECS

Model WDM360TX
Dimensions (WDH) 15.1" x 13" x 22"
Weight 38.5 lb
Electrical 120v / 60 hz / 2.2a, NEMA 5-15P 
Listings NSF approved

WARRANTY

entry.title: Waring WSV25 - Sous Vide Cooker- 25 Litres
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Sous Vide
Price: 1448.00

Waring's WSV25 is a sous vide cooker built with a 25 litre capacity. It is a thermal immersion circulator with an integrated bath that has a durable build constructed of stainless steel. It has 5 programmable memory stations and a 99-hour timer. This means your cook times and temperatures are highly customizable; once you make your cycles, you just have to set them to buttons labelled one through five — sort of like a car radio!

There's an easily attachable/removable hose to add and drain water from the reservoir. The operable temperature range of this sous vide cooker is from 35 to 90 degrees Celsius. This model also includes both a rack to hold your food and a rack lift.

Sous Vide cooking is all the rage nowadays and is quickly becoming professional chefs' cooking method of choice. The reason being is that sous vide cooking retains those natural juices and nutrients, leading to all-around healthier dishes. If you're unfamiliar with the process, all you have to do is season your food with your favourite herbs and spices, vacuum seal it, and submerge it in water to cook at an even temperature.

      • 25 litre capacity
      • Constructed of stainless steel
      • 5 programmable memory stations 
      • 99-hour timer
      • Customizable cook times and temperatures
      • Easily attachable/detachable hose to fill or drain water
      • Temperature range of 35 - 90 degrees Celsius
      • Includes two food racks and rack lift

    SPECS

    Model WSV25
    Dimensions (WDH) 14.25" x 23.5" x 10.5"
    Weight 20 lb
    Electrical 120v/1560w/13a
    Cord Length 3.5 ft.
    Listings cETLus, ETL Sanitation

    WARRANTY

    One year parts and labour warranty.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Hot Water Dispenser
Price: 1583.00

The Waring Commercial WWB10G is a high volume hot water dispenser with a 10 gallon capacity (37 litres). It's perfect for teas, soups, cereals, and more! Equipped with a blue-lit LCD display and easy-to-use touchpad controls, you won't have to worry about wasting time with excessive training for yourself or your staff. Also, it has a sleek design constructed completely of stainless steel! So it looks great front-of-house.

The Waring WWB10G functions with either automatic water refill or pour-over capability. The temperature range is from 66 degrees to 96 degrees Celsius, and it can heat up to 10 gallons of water in 3 hours. You can even set a night-mode feature to have your dispenser start heating overnight. This way your water can be ready for those busy, breakfast rushes, etc.

entry.title: Waring Commercial Big Stik - Medium Duty Immersion Blender
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Commercial Immersion Blender
Price: 507.00 - 858.00 (7 variants)

The Waring Big Stik series of stick mixers is able to crank out the smoothest sauces, gravies, dressings, marianades, and soups in seconds. These are heavy duty blenders, perfect for high-volume kitchens, with five different size shaft that start at 12" in length, to 21" in length.

Each model has a heavy-duty 1 HP motor, with 750W variable speed (from 5,000 to 18,000 RPM). And they have a continuous ON feature. They have a comfortable grip and a second handle -- overall its a lightweight, ergonomic design which will allow for safe and controlled operation during any size job. The shafts are stainless steel and easily removable for cleaning (plus they are dishwasher safe).

      • Heavy-Duty Motor – High efficiency 1 HP motor, 750 watts
      • Variable Speed Motor – Unlimited speed adjustment from 5,000 – 18,000 RPMs provides full control and consistency, from light mixing to puréeing and emulsifying
      • Lightweight and Ergonomic – Rubberized comfort grip and second handle allow for safe and controlled operation
      • Completely Sealed Shafts – Stainless steel shafts are easily removable and dishwasher safe
      • Continuous On Operation
      • Versatility – All five stainless steel shafts are interchangeable with one universal motor housing (Power pack – WSBPP)

entry.title: Waring WCU110 - Commercial Coffee Urn with 26 Litre Capacity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Coffee Urn
Price: 353.00

The Waring Commercial WCU110 is a premium coffee urn that will give you short brew times, large capacites, and a durable construction. It's perfect for catering companies or for commercial kitchens. Its has a capacity of 26 litres (110 cups) and a minimum capacity of 7 litres (30 cups).

It has a dual-heater system, which will brew the coffee with a hotter first heater -- this will ensure the best flavour for your coffee -- and then it will automatically shift to a second heater which has a lower heat setting, that will hold it at the perfect drinking temperature.

      • Brew 110, 5 oz. cups in just over an hour
      • All stainless steel construction, including internals and parts
      • Single wall tank
      • Commercial-grade heater
      • Dual-heater system for brewing and keeping warm at optimal temperatures; brews at 200°F and dispenses at approximately 185°F
      • ON/OFF lighted power switch and Ready indicator light

entry.title: Waring WCU30 - Commercial Coffee Urn with 7 Litre Capacity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Coffee Urn
Price: 269.00

The Waring Commercial WCU30 is a premium coffee urn that will give you short brew times, large capacites, and a durable construction. It's perfect for catering companies or for commercial kitchens. Its has a capacity of 7 litres (30 cups) and a minimum capacity of 2.3 litres (10 cups).

It has a dual-heater system, which will brew the coffee with a hotter first heater -- this will ensure the best flavour for your coffee -- and then it will automatically shift to a second heater which has a lower heat setting, that will hold it at the perfect drinking temperature.

      • Brew 30, 5 oz. cups in 20 minutes
      • All stainless steel construction, including internals and parts
      • Single wall tank
      • Commercial-grade heater
      • Dual-heater system for brewing and keeping warm at optimal temperatures; brews at 200°F and dispenses at approximately 185°F
      • ON/OFF lighted power switch and Ready indicator light
      • Boil dry protection with auto reset

Cook the perfect pasta every time with the Waring Commercial WPC100 pasta cooker and re-thermalizer. You'll be able to make individual orders with the 4 small, round baskets, or you can prepare larger batches with the large rectangular baskets.

This commercial pasta cooker has a durable, stainless steel construction, with stainless steel tubular heating elements for quick heat up, with a 12.4 litre (13.9 quart) max capacity.

      • Durable stainless steel construction

entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Hot Plate
Price: 316.00

The Waring Commercial WDB600 has two heavy-duty cast iron burners: one is 7" and the other is 6". The larger burner is 1300 watts and heats up quickly for fast cooking, and the 500-watt smaller burner is perfect for simmering and warming. Both burners have the heating element embedding into their cast iron plates, so you'll get a quick heat-up with an even heat-distribution.

      • 7" and 6" cast-iron burner plates
      • 1300-watt burner and 500-watt burner (1800-watt total)
      • Heavy-duty cast-iron burner plates

Vendor: Waring

Price: 1445.00

The Waring Commercial WIH800 is a commercial induction cooker with 208/240v and 3600 watts of power. It has a step-up burner, which allows easy access to the pot or pan on the back burner, while also taking up a small width on your countertop. It has two large 11" x 11" ceramic glass cooking surfaces, and 12 temperature settings between 120˚F to 500˚F, which are independent for each burner.

      • Easy-touch controls with 12 temperature settings from 120˚F to 500˚F (79˚C to 260˚C)

entry.title: Waring WCO500X - Half Size Convection Oven with Roast, Broil, and Bake Functions - 4 Shelves
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Countertop Convection Oven
Price: 1133.00

The Waring Commercial WCO500X offers you four different cooking methods in one countertop oven: it can convection bake, roast, bake, and broil. It can hold up to 4 half-size sheets pans, and comes with 3 baking racks and 1 half-size sheet pan.

It's been made of a heavy-duty, brushed stainless steel, and it can easily handle bread, roasts, pizzas, pies, and more. The glass door is double-paned and offers a good visibility of what you're cooking. This will be a great oven for any commercial kitchen.

      • Convection bake, roast, bake and broil functions.
      • Double-pane tempered glass door.
      • Advanced airflow design.
      • Heavy-duty, stainless steel construction.
      • Heat settings from 150°F – 500°F.
      • Handles up to 4 half-size sheet pans
      • 3 baking racks and 1 half-size sheet pan included
      • NSF approved.
      • Shipped on a pallet (may require a tailgate charge)
